name: In The Clouds
description:
In The Clouds is a short, melancholic re-interpretation of the arcade classic Asteroids, that explores the psyche of a young boy. 

Controls
WASD - move
Mouse - change direction
Left Mouse Button - shine torch

Credits
Music, sound design, environment art and game design by Jacob James 
soundcloud.com/jacobjamesaus | @jacobjamesaus
Character art & animation, programming, game design by Michael Boag
@MichaelJBoag
Programming & Game Design by Jason Tsorlinis
@jtsorlinis92 
Additional environment art by Nelsen Denheld

This game was made for a  university project at Swinburne University of Technology.
